event.title: Last Thursday, Zimbabwean president Robert Mugabe announced

data.event: Last Thursday, Zimbabwean president Robert Mugabe announced in a televised address that the outbreak had been halted, saying that "I am happy to say our doctors are being assisted by others, and the WHO [World Health Organization] have now arrested cholera."

event.title: Now that there is no cholera, there is no cause for war," he stated

data.event: "Now that there is no cholera, there is no cause for war," he stated.
